*Some settings*
{{{
<plugin id="org.opengroove.examples.test01">
    <authors>
        <author name="The OpenGroove Team"/>
        <author name="Alexander Boyd"/>
    </authors>
    <requires>
        <import name="org.opengroove.client.settings"/>
    </requires>
    <runtime>
        <internal/>
    </runtime> 
    <extensions>
        <extension plugin="org.opengroove.client.settings" point="settings">
            <tab id="testtab" name="Test tab" icon="testtab-icon.png" description="This is a test tab">
                <setting id="name" name="Your name" description="Type your name here" type="text" rows="1" cols="20" default="No name"/>
            </tab>
        </extension>
    </extensions>
</plugin>
